name: Get Money Honey!
description:
This bath could be the push you needed towards more money in your account!!! So grab your money candle and turn your bathtub into a cauldron! Perfect for use before prosperity, wealth, abundance, or money rituals. It is also awesome as a standalone, simply letting the bath itself work its magic on your life. Lie back in this steamy herbal bath and imagine your life once you've accomplished your goal. Stepping out of the bath, imagine yourself stepping into that new reality as your higher self, and don't forget to thank the herbs for their service!


Every herb in this bath was thoroughly researched and chosen specifically to bring certain powers to this bath. Once purchased you will receive a full ingredient list. If you have any allergy concerns please message me, and I will be more than happy to discuss what I use to figure out something that works for you!
